setupScript:
local pIDs = GetPlayerIDs()
-- player 1
-- set ownership
TileOwnerSet(pIDs[1], {
{2, 0},
{0, 1},
{1, 1},
{2, 1},
{3, 1},
{4, 1},
{1, 2},
{2, 2},
{3, 2},
})
-- place entities
CreateAndPutEntity(pIDs[1], {2, 1}, 'dev::Castle')
CreateAndPutEntity(pIDs[1], {0, 1}, 'dev::Mana Drill')
CreateAndPutEntity(pIDs[1], {1, 1}, 'dev::Mana Drill')
CreateAndPutEntity(pIDs[1], {1, 2}, 'dev::Mana Drill')
-- player 2
-- set ownership
TileOwnerSet(pIDs[2], {
{12, 0},
{11, 1},
{10, 1},
{13, 1},
{12, 1},
{11, 2},
{14, 1},
{13, 2},
{12, 2},
})
-- place entities
CreateAndPutEntity(pIDs[2], {12, 1}, 'dev::Castle')
CreateAndPutEntity(pIDs[2], {14, 1}, 'dev::Mana Drill')
CreateAndPutEntity(pIDs[2], {13, 1}, 'dev::Mana Drill')
CreateAndPutEntity(pIDs[2], {13, 2}, 'dev::Mana Drill')
